typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string
}
source(output(
		RideEstimativeID as integer,
		RideID as integer,
		ProductID as string,
		WaitingTime as integer,
		Price as decimal(18,2),
		FareID as string,
		Selected as boolean,
		RideReasonSelectedEstimativeID as integer,
		Fee as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Ride
source(output(
		RideEstimativeID as integer,
		RideID as integer,
		ProductID as string,
		WaitingTime as integer,
		Price as decimal(18,2),
		FareID as string,
		Selected as boolean,
		RideReasonSelectedEstimativeID as integer,
		Fee as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Receipt
source(output(
		RideEstimativeID as integer,
		RideID as integer,
		ProductID as string,
		WaitingTime as integer,
		Price as decimal(18,2),
		FareID as string,
		Selected as boolean,
		RideReasonSelectedEstimativeID as integer,
		Fee as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RideEstimative
Ride, Receipt join(Ride@RideID == Receipt@RideID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, RideEstimative join(Ride@RideID == RideEstimative@RideID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dash.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrganizationDash
